title: Exhaust Patch 7.5
body:
Thoughts about the nerf to Exhaust?

If Flash can serve 1000 purposes then why can't exhaust serve 13?

replies.body: I'm ok with it, Exhaust had 0 counterplay before, and now it won't be used offensively except for a slow, it will still do its job just fine.

> [{quoted}](name=Jargon Wan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f2gA89xZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-08T20:54:35.909+0000)
>
> I'm ok with it, Exhaust had 0 counterplay before, and now it won't be used offensively except for a slow, it will still do its job just fine.

Do you think Flash is just a better Exhaust at this point or...? Because both skills are mobility skills now... And you can compare them now that they are Red Apples basically.

Or am I missing something?

askjhfalsdjkfheuwfgawl;ighakjrlg aelghalejrgh

WHHHAT?

>Because both skills are mobility skills now...

How is Exhaust a MOBILITY spell?

> [{quoted}](name=Jargon Wan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f2gA89xZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T21:00:09.621+0000)
>
> askjhfalsdjkfheuwfgawl;ighakjrlg aelghalejrgh
> 
> WHHHAT?
> 
> How is Exhaust a MOBILITY spell?

It has something to do with Mobility now. It's only a slow now.

It always slowed .-.

Exhaust pre nerf
Exhausts target enemy champion, Slow icon slowing them by 30%, and reducing their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds, shredding armor and magic resist by ten, and slowing atk speed by 30%

Exhaust after nerf
Exhausts target enemy champion, Slow icon slowing them by 30%, and reducing their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

....

The nerf was good, you can't use exhaust offensively anymore except for the small slow
How can you compare flash to exhaust... exhaust has a specific purpose flash doesn't.

The difference is that flash is basically a game mechanic, not a summoner spell.
The choice of a summoner spell is meant to be balanced so everything that is not flash has a place and a use, without being too strong.
I guess people are just indifferent to the changes then. Maybe Supports will get Heal too now that Exhaust doesn't Save ADC fights anymore at bot-lane.

Flash has 5 minute CD, you can actually play around its long CD.

Exhaust was actually stronger than flash on a lower CD (up every fight), now its not as overpowered.
